entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain showers or periods of drizzle late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
